name: WOWRADIOCT
skdetail:

Invocation Name: wow radio c. t.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Broadcasting live from the WOW RADIO STUDIOS located at Wow Toyota of Wallingford. WOW RADIO plays all your favorite music from the 60’s through the 90’s. Longtime CT radio legends Brian Smith and Pam Landry broadcast LIVE weekdays 11a-3p and along with the music, feature local weather and community news updates as well as special guests from across the community spotlighting local businesses, non profits and local bands.
priv:
